item.title: This App Will Notify You World Cup Updates 15 Seconds Before Anyone Else In The World !
item.description: Here we are ! FIFA World Cup is under way in Russia. This is high time to get notifications in your devices fast as possible. I was trying all the apps I know. Most of them are good at notifying the goal updates as fast your TV. But I found one app. This app will put you ahead of the television live telecasts. Here we are ! item.title: blogging with pelican and jupyter notebook
item.description: Recently, I made this blog using Pelican and a number of other tools. I want to share the process as simple as possible. The blog is hosted in Github as Github Pages.This first post mainly focused on how I made this blog possible. I have been a member in Github for long time and I never took it as serious as I am now. I was aware of github pages as well. I thought the main aim of github pages is to host your documentation kind of stuff, I never expected you can build whole new blog just like blogger or even better control over it. So I read one post from dataquest last week, then I releazed the power of github pages and how people are sharing their ideas with ease. Officially github is focusing on Jekyll static generator, but I found out that Pelican is the one I need because it makes easy to share jupyter notebooks. I have been Googling all the time and reading number of blogs and help links and so many other stuff over the course of making the blog. SO I thought it would be better if somebody want to build one and they can refer a single place.
item.dc:creator: Vipin G S
